/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Among these structures, a tall tower stands out, its height dwarfing the surrounding buildings and reaching towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
